name: Ghostory
description: Puns, and puzzles. Horrible puns and devious puzzles actually, along with several incorporeal entities are what makes Ghostory a pixel art puzzle adventure brimming with humour and intrigue. Take on the role of a cursed traveler, master your ghostly form, find a cure, and escape a perilous cave system.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
